fullDescription.intro: Reader for ORC files. It reads either single files or all files in a given directory. Does support all ORC types except map, struct and union.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The file or directory to read.

tab.name: Input Type Mapping
tab.description: Change the ORC to KNIME type mapping configuration for subsequent nodes by selecting a KNIME type to the given ORC Type. The dialog allows you to add new or change existing type mapping rules.
tab.option: Columns that match the given name (or regular expression) and ORC type will be mapped to the specified KNIME type.
Columns that match the given ORC type will be mapped to the specified KNIME type.

ports.inPort: Optional port for a remote connection.
ports.outPort: Data table containing the data of the ORC file.
